mapper.sql: IC_TopupOrder.ID as ID ,IC_TopupOrder.UID as UID ,IC_TopupOrder.TerminalNO as TerminalNO ,IC_TopupOrder.OrderNO as OrderNO ,IC_TopupOrder.CardNO as CardNO ,IC_TopupOrder.Counter as Counter ,IC_TopupOrder.Balance as Balance ,IC_TopupOrder.TxnAmount as TxnAmount ,IC_TopupOrder.OrderState as OrderState ,IC_TopupOrder.OrderBackDate as OrderBackDate ,IC_TopupOrder.LoadState as LoadState ,IC_TopupOrder.LoadDescribe as LoadDescribe ,IC_TopupOrder.LoadBackDate as LoadBackDate ,IC_TopupOrder.PayMethodId as PayMethodId ,IC_TopupOrder.PayTime as PayTime ,IC_TopupOrder.PayResult as PayResult ,IC_TopupOrder.PayResultMsg as PayResultMsg ,IC_TopupOrder.TAC as TAC ,IC_TopupOrder.ReviewID as ReviewID ,IC_TopupOrder.ReviewTime as ReviewTime ,IC_TopupOrder.SummaryTime as SummaryTime ,IC_TopupOrder.MAC as MAC ,IC_TopupOrder.TxnDateTime as TxnDateTime ,IC_TopupOrder.OrderDescribe as OrderDescribe
mapper.select:
select
from IC_TopupOrder
and IC_TopupOrder.TerminalNO like '%${auditRemark}%' OR IC_TopupOrder.OrderNO like '%${auditRemark}%' OR IC_TopupOrder.CardNO like '%${auditRemark}%'
and IC_TopupOrder.TxnDateTime >= '${sdate} 0:00:00' and IC_TopupOrder.TxnDateTime <= '${edate} 23:59:59'
and IC_TopupOrder.PayMethodId = '${payMethodId}' and IC_TopupOrder.PayResult = '${payResult}'
and IC_TopupOrder.PayResult is not null
order by ${sort} ${order}
order by IC_TopupOrder.TxnDateTime desc
Offset ${offset} Row Fetch Next ${limit} Rows Only

select count(*) from IC_TopupOrder
and IC_TopupOrder.TerminalNO like '%${auditRemark}%' OR IC_TopupOrder.OrderNO like '%${auditRemark}%' OR IC_TopupOrder.CardNO like '%${auditRemark}%'
and IC_TopupOrder.TxnDateTime >= '${sdate} 0:00:00' and IC_TopupOrder.TxnDateTime <= '${edate} 23:59:59'
and IC_TopupOrder.PayResult is not null

update IC_TopupOrder set IC_TopupOrder.AuditStatus = #{auditvalue},IC_TopupOrder.AuditUID = #{chkuserid},IC_TopupOrder.AuditDateTime=getdate(), IC_TopupOrder.AuditRemark=#{remark} where IC_TopupOrder.ID=#{id}
